statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSInspectorFinding) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSInspectorFinding)<-[r]-(:EC2Instance) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSInspectorFinding)-[r:HAS]->(package:AWSInspectorPackage) WHERE package.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH package LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (package)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSInspectorFinding)-[r:HAS]->(:AWSInspectorPackage) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
